sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO nmember( userid, pass, name, birth, phone, gender, zipcode, address) VALUES( #userid#, #pass#, #name#, #birth#, #phone#, #gender#, #zipcode#, #address# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nmember WHERE userid=#userid#
select count(*) from nmember where userid=#userid# AND pass=#pass#
